controller

Class ContactsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ContactsController

  • public class ContactsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the contacts part.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfContactUsed()
      Method that checks if a Person is used in Borrowed Things or in Wishlist
      boolean checkIfPersonexists(java.lang.String name)
      Boolean method that gets a Person's name as a parameter and tells PersonDAO to read the Person with this name from the database.
      void deletePerson()
      Method that gets the selected person from contactsTableGUI, tells PersonDAO to delete the person from the database and contactsTableGUI to delete it from the tableView.
      void deletePersonAndEvents()
      Method deletes Borrowed Things and/or Wishlist Items and calendar events connected to them that use a Person that should be deleted After deleting data using this Person this method calls deletePerson() method
      Person[] getPeople()
      Method that gets Persons from PersonDAO and returns a list containing persons's details
      void savePerson()
      Method that gets person details from ContactsGUI, creates a new Person, and gives it forward to PersonDAO to add it to the database.
      boolean updatePerson(Person editedPerson)
      Boolean method that gets a Person that was updated in the application as a parameter and tells PersonDAO to update it.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • savePerson

        public void savePerson()
        Method that gets person details from ContactsGUI, creates a new Person, and gives it forward to PersonDAO to add it to the database. If there's a birthday added to person details, creates an yearly event and gives it forward to EventDAO to add to the database

      • deletePerson

        public void deletePerson()
        Method that gets the selected person from contactsTableGUI, tells PersonDAO to delete the person from the database and contactsTableGUI to delete it from the tableView.

      • getPeople

        public Person[] getPeople()
        Method that gets Persons from PersonDAO and returns a list containing persons's details
        Returns:
        Person[] list of persons

      • checkIfContactUsed

        public boolean checkIfContactUsed()
        Method that checks if a Person is used in Borrowed Things or in Wishlist
        Returns:
        true if contact is used somewhere, false if contact is not used anywhere

      • deletePersonAndEvents

        public void deletePersonAndEvents()
        Method deletes Borrowed Things and/or Wishlist Items and calendar events connected to them that use a Person that should be deleted After deleting data using this Person this method calls deletePerson() method

      • updatePerson

        public boolean updatePerson(Person editedPerson)
        Boolean method that gets a Person that was updated in the application as a parameter and tells PersonDAO to update it. and creates a database birthday Event.
        Parameters:
        editedPerson - - the Person that needs to be updated
        Returns:
        true - if person was successfully updated, false - if updating a person didn't succeed

      • checkIfPersonexists

        public boolean checkIfPersonexists(java.lang.String name)
        Boolean method that gets a Person's name as a parameter and tells PersonDAO to read the Person with this name from the database. Same names for different people is not supported.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the Person that needs to be found
        Returns:
        true - if person was successfully found, false - if finding a person didn't succeed
